title: Poached Chicken With Bok Choy In Ginger Broth
summary: Poached Chicken With Bok Choy In Ginger Broth is a caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal main course. One serving contains 154 calories, 26g of protein, and 3g of fat. This recipe serves 4 and costs $3.01 per serving. If you have shiitake mushrooms, dill, scallions, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the water you could follow this main course with the Watermelon-Peach Slushies as a dessert. 5 people were glad they tried this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 26 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 68%, this dish is solid. Try Garlic Ginger Zucchini Noodle Bowl with Salmon and Bok Choy, Black Cod Fillets Poached in Five-Spice Broth with Baby Bok Choy and Udon, and Bok Choy, Shiitake, and Garlic Noodles for similar recipes.
